title: LFT - Wanting to get into Ranked Teams (Currently ranked G3)
body:
I'm looking at getting into ranked teams now, ladder anxiety for me sucks so much that i rarely play solo queue and I play in premades instead.

Tend to play norms only, despite my current ranking of Gold 3 (only 11 games played though). In saying that I'm usually placed against many Plats and the occasional Diamond.

I play mostly ADC (Sivir, Varus, Corki are my best) but I can play other roles and have played specific champions in those roles. I can be slightly unconventional with my picks, but recently these have come into the meta (eg. Viktor has been my favourite mage since early Season 3).

Comment below if you're looking for an extra player or wanting to start a team up and we can go from there. If this doesn't interest you then that's cool and I wish you luck on the Rift.

replies.body: Gold 4 and climbing prefer anywhere but jungle add me in game if interested
Plat IV here, mainly plays mid support adc, available on Friday to Sunday, add me if you're interested in creating a ranked team.

Hey Dude, Plat 5 here. I'm a Top laner but i can play other lanes as well, I'm interested in finding people to team up with. My pool top mainly consists of Jax, Riven, Mao, Kennen, Renekton, Morde, Irelia, Fiora, Pantheon and Zac. If youre interested add me "Best Ekko Jamal"
